project: CitiesRegional - Regional Multiplayer Mod for CS2
scope_completed: Added reflection-only Gooee API probe ([GooeeProbe]) and wired it into the placeholder Gooee plugin startup logging
Updated Gooee API testing guide and research notes to reference probe markers
Made logging test-safe outside Unity/BepInEx by using reflection-based Unity logging fallback and Console fallback
Made ResourceData export/import defaults consistent (derived from production/consumption unless explicitly set)
Adjusted log analyzer to recognize CitiesRegional entries in BepInEx logs and gated log-dependent validations behind an opt-in env var
decisions_made: Use reflection-only Gooee probing to avoid compile-time dependency on deprecated/unstable Gooee API
Keep log-driven integration validations opt-in to ensure deterministic CI/unit test execution
tradeoffs: Gooee API availability is verified via runtime logs rather than compile-time typing, reducing compile-time guarantees but improving compatibility
Computed export/import defaults can be overridden by explicit values; the implicit default is based on production/consumption for consistency
blockers: In-game Gooee API verification requires launching Cities: Skylines 2 with Gooee enabled
